cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sukunai

sentence.kanji: 今年は雨が少ないです。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi ha ame ga sukunai desu 。
sentence.english: There's not much rain this year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ooi

sentence.kanji: 京都にはお寺が多い。
sentence.romaji: kyouto ni ha otera ga ooi
sentence.english: There are a lot of temples in Kyoto.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sukoshi

sentence.kanji: 少し疲れました。
sentence.romaji: sukoshi tsukaremashita
sentence.english: I'm a little tired.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futoi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は足が太い。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ashi ga futoi
sentence.english: She has fat legs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ookii

sentence.kanji: あの大きい建物は何ですか。
sentence.romaji: ano ookii tatemono ha nan desu ka
sentence.english: What's that big building?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chiisai

sentence.kanji: 小さい花が咲いています。
sentence.romaji: chiisai hana ga saite imasu
sentence.english: Small flowers are blooming.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daisuki

sentence.kanji: 私は犬が大好きだ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha inu ga daisuki da
sentence.english: I love dogs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishi

sentence.kanji: 私は石につまづいた。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ishi ni tsumazuita
sentence.english: I tripped on a stone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soto

sentence.kanji: 外は暑いよ。
sentence.romaji: soto ha atsuiyo
sentence.english: It's hot outside.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sukoshimo

sentence.kanji: あなたは少しも悪くない。
sentence.romaji: anata ha sukoshimo waruku nai
sentence.english: It's not your fault at all.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuumei

sentence.kanji: ボルドーはワインの生産で有名だ。
sentence.romaji: borudo- ha wain no seisan de yuumei da
sentence.english: Bordeau is famous for wine production.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ooku

sentence.kanji: 毎年多くの人が海外へ旅行する。
sentence.romaji: maitoshi ooku no hito ga kaigai he ryokou suru
sentence.english: A lot of people travel abroad every year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikaru

sentence.kanji: 波がきらきら光っていました。
sentence.romaji: nami ga kirakira hikate imashita
sentence.english: The waves sparkled brilliantly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futoru

sentence.kanji: 私の姉はすぐ太ります。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ane ha sugu futorimasu
sentence.english: My big sister puts on weight easily.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taisetsu

sentence.kanji: これは母が大切にしていた指輪です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha haha ga taisetsu ni shite ita yubiwa desu
sentence.english: This is a ring that meant a lot to my mother.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kezuru

sentence.kanji: 彼は家族のために仕事の時間を削った。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kazoku no tame ni shigoto no jikan wo kezuta
sentence.english: He reduced his working hours for his family's sake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoushou

sentence.kanji: 塩を少々入れてください。
sentence.romaji: shio wo shoushou irete kudasai
sentence.english: Please put in a little salt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsui

sentence.kanji: その辞書はとても厚い。
sentence.romaji: sono jisho ha totemo atsui
sentence.english: That dictionary is very thick.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsusa

sentence.kanji: 私は板の厚さを測った。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ita no atsusa wo hakata
sentence.english: I measured the thickness of the board.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kusai

sentence.kanji: 納豆は臭い。
sentence.romaji: natou ha kusai
sentence.english: Natto stinks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ookisa

sentence.kanji: この大きさの封筒が欲しいのですが。
sentence.romaji: kono ookisa no fuutou ga hoshii no desu ga
sentence.english: I'd like an envelope of this size.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dai

sentence.kanji: チーズケーキの大を一つ下さい。
sentence.romaji: chi-zuke-ki no dai wo hitotsu kudasai
sentence.english: Please give me a slice of the large size cheesecake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hazureru

sentence.kanji: びんのふたが外れません。
sentence.romaji: bin no futa ga hazuremasen
sentence.english: The jar's lid won't come off.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hazure

sentence.kanji: このくじは外れです。
sentence.romaji: kono kuji ha hazure desu
sentence.english: This is a losing ticket.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanabata

sentence.kanji: 日本では7月7日は七夕の日です。
sentence.romaji: nihon de ha 7 gatsu 7 ka ha tanabata no hi desu
sentence.english: July 7th is the day of the Tanabata Festival in Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tashou

sentence.kanji: このソフトには多少問題がある。
sentence.romaji: kono sofuto ni ha tashou mondai ga aru
sentence.english: There are some problems with this software.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sukunakutomo

sentence.kanji: この仕事には少なくとも2週間必要でしょう。
sentence.romaji: kono shigoto ni ha sukunakutomo nishuukan hitsuyou deshou
sentence.english: At least two weeks will be needed for this job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ooini

sentence.kanji: 大いに学び、大いに遊びなさい。
sentence.romaji: ooini manabi ooini asobinasai
sentence.english: Study hard, play hard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daiku

sentence.kanji: 私の父は大工です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no chichi ha daiku desu
sentence.english: My father's a carpenter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oogesa

sentence.kanji: 彼の話は大げさだ。
sentence.romaji: kare no hanashi ha oogesa da
sentence.english: His story is exaggerated.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hazusu

sentence.kanji: 彼はメガネを外しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha megane wo hazushimashita
sentence.english: He removed his glasses.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machihazure

sentence.kanji: 彼女は町外れの工場で働いているよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha machihazure no koujou de hataraite iru yo
sentence.english: She's working in a factory on the outskirts of town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utsuwa

sentence.kanji: この器は上等ね。
sentence.romaji: kono utsuwa ha joutou ne
sentence.english: This dish is really top quality.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigu

sentence.kanji: これはスポーツ施設用の器具です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha supo-tsu shisetsuyou no kigu desu
sentence.english: This is equipment for the sports facility.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daishou

sentence.kanji: 応募作品の大小は問いません。
sentence.romaji: oubo sakuhin no daishou ha toimasen
sentence.english: Submitted works of all sizes accepted.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's na

sentence.kanji: 彼は名の通った会社に就職しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha na no toota kaisha ni shuushoku shimashita
sentence.english: He found employment in a well-known company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuuhi

sentence.kanji: 夕日が西の空に沈んだね。
sentence.romaji: yuuhi ga nishi no sora ni shizunda ne
sentence.english: The evening sun sunk in the western sky.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nikou

sentence.kanji: この部屋は日光がよく当たるね。
sentence.romaji: kono heya ha nikou ga yoku ataru ne
sentence.english: This room gets quite a lot of sunshine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's habuku

sentence.kanji: 時間がないので詳細は省きます。
sentence.romaji: jikan ga nai no de shousai ha habukimasu
sentence.english: I'll omit the details as there is no time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nioi

sentence.kanji: ここはいやな臭いがする。
sentence.romaji: koko ha iya na nioi ga suru 。
sentence.english: There's an unpleasant smell here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niou

sentence.kanji: 流しが臭うのできれいにしたよ。
sentence.romaji: nagashi ga niou no de kirei ni shita yo
sentence.english: I cleaned the sink because it smelled.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daitan

sentence.kanji: 彼女はずいぶん大胆なことを言うね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha zuibun daitan na koto wo iu ne
sentence.english: She says fairly bold things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikari

sentence.kanji: 一筋の光が窓から差し込んだの。
sentence.romaji: hitosuji no hikari ga mado kara sashikonda no
sentence.english: A beam of light shone through the window.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shou

sentence.kanji: この箱の小をください。
sentence.romaji: kono hako no shou wo kudasai
sentence.english: Please give me the small version of this box.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoujo

sentence.kanji: 少女は母親の手を握った。
sentence.romaji: shoujo ha hahaoya no te wo nigita
sentence.english: The girl clasped her mother's hand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoushou

sentence.kanji: 少々のことは我慢します。
sentence.romaji: shoushou no koto ha gaman shimasu
sentence.english: I can put up with minor things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kudaku

sentence.kanji: 氷を細かく砕いてください。
sentence.romaji: koori wo komakaku kudaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please crush the ice into small pieces.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kudakeru

sentence.kanji: 石が粉々に砕けましたね。
sentence.romaji: ishi ga konagona ni kudakemashita ne
sentence.english: The stone was crushed to pieces.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suna

sentence.kanji: 靴に砂が入ってしまった。
sentence.romaji: kutsu ni suna ga haite shimata
sentence.english: Sand has got into my shoes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taishite

sentence.kanji: 彼は大して嬉しそうには見えなかったよね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha taishite ureshi sou ni ha mienakata yo ne
sentence.english: He didn't look particularly happy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kagu

sentence.kanji: 犬がお皿の匂いをクンクン嗅いでいるね。
sentence.romaji: inu ga osara no nioi wo kunkun kaide iru ne
sentence.english: The dog sniffed at the smell on the plate.
